properties.title: Easy XPath creating - soapUI Pro XPath selector

section.name: soapUI Pro XPath Selection Dialog
section.p: soapUI Pro includes a XPath Wizard or Selection dialog that is available wherever an XPath expression is required:

The selector displays general instructions and a tree-view of the message or XML to be selected from. Navigating the tree displays the corresponding XPath expression for the current node below. Selecting the desired node and pressing OK will close the dialog and return the selected XPath expression to the calling functionality.
